item.title: Collector and MLA Join Beneficiaries for Community Meal to Promote Fine Rice Scheme in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a significant outreach effort to highlight the Telangana government's flagship initiative to combat hunger and improve nutrition among economically disadvantaged families, District Collector B..M. Santosh and Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy personally participated in a community lunch at Mallapuram village in Kettidoddi Mandal on Tuesday.
The event was organized as part of the governmentâ€™s prestigious Fine Rice Distribution Scheme, which aims to provide high-quality fine rice t...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
